v2.headline: LinkedIn GTM strategy for B2B founders using AI, social selling & relevant content. | AI Growth Systems | 30+ clients transformed | Co-Founder of Nomad V Group
v2.about:
As a B2B founder on LinkedIn, you can take two paths:

➤ Path 1:

Keep trading time for money... 
Working harder but earning the same... 
Your expertise stays hidden... 

You will:

→ Stay invisible. 
→ Watch others with less skill charge more. 
→ Have unpredictable revenue


➤ Path 2: Turn your LinkedIn profile into a 6-fig/mo system and save 20+ hours per week.

I've helped 30+ founders & solopreneurs from different industries take Path 2 using AI-powered LinkedIn strategies.

Here's how it works:

✅ Offer Creation & Validation - Package your skills into irresistible offers that command premium prices

✅ Social Selling Mastery - Build qualified lead lists through strategic lead segmentation of your current network and outside of your network so you can know exactly where your dream client is spending time on LinkedIn.

✅ Personal Brand Accelerator - Unlock your unique business genius and position yourself as the go-to expert

✅ AI Conversion Content System - Create content repurposing system that converts prospects into paying clients with 1 post & 1 email daily

✅ Create commenting campaigns that boost your reach and warm up your dream audience

✅ Launch your outbound campaign that will synchronize all of your activity above and book a 2-5 qualified meetings per week.

✅ Performance Optimization - Track, measure, and scale what is working for your LinkedIn strategic presence.

➤ What makes this different?

I quit my 9-5 job in 8 months after being active on LinkedIn
In my second year on LinkedIn, I hit my first 3 consistent months with predictable revenue growth.

I was there.
I know what it is like to be in the situation where you currently are.
I made so many mistakes until I got where I am currently.

That’s why you can skip what I get wrong and make it work way faster.

This isn't about becoming an influencer or posting motivational quotes.

It's about using your existing skills + simple AI tools and workflows + LinkedIn to create predictable income.

Real results from real people you can see in my recommendation section.

The truth? 
You already have everything you need. 
You just need the right system to package and sell it.

---

➤ DM me and I'll show you exactly how this works.
